




# No Pad

from

11111111, 22222222, 33333333

to

11111111 => 00111111, strip 11
22222222 -> 00222222, strip 22 -> add 11, 11222222 -> 00112222, strip 22 => summarised strip 2222
33333333 -> 00003333, strip 3333 -> add 2222, 22223333 -> 00222233, strip 33 => summarised strip 333333, collect into 00333333

00111111, 00112222, 00222233, 00333333



# One Pad

from 

11111111, 22222222

to 

11111111 => 00111111, strip 11
22222222 -> 00222222, strip 22 -> add 11, 11222222 -> 00112222, strip 22 => summarised strip 2222
add 2222 -> 00002222 -> add 00, 00222200 
add =

00111111, 00112222, 00222200, =
